FOUND IN: Tights: Thin legwear that covers the wearer's entire legs and feet while leaving the arms uncovered; often translucent and can be either sheer or opaque.
Bertolt Brecht - Co-founder of the Epic Theater movement; notable works include "Baal," "The Threepenny Opera," and "Mother Courage and Her Children."
Cart: A two-wheeled or four-wheerannied vehicle that can transport small to medium loads, often pulled by animals.
